mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, account_id AS accountId, name, phone, membership_type AS membershipType, membership_start_date AS membershipStartDate, membership_end_date AS membershipEndDate, status FROM members

SELECT member_id AS memberId, account_id AS accountId, name, phone, membership_type AS membershipType, membership_start_date AS membershipStartDate, membership_end_date AS membershipEndDate, status FROM members WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT member_id AS memberId, account_id AS accountId, name, phone, membership_type AS membershipType, membership_start_date AS membershipStartDate, membership_end_date AS membershipEndDate, status FROM members WHERE (member_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, membership_type = #{membershipType}, membership_start_date = #{membershipStartDate}, membership_end_date = #{membershipEndDate}, status = #{status} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
